Osbournes, The.translation[0].definition: a US reality TV show, first broadcast in 2002, which shows the home life of the heavy metal singer Ozzy Osbourne, his wife Sharon, his son Jack, his daughter Kelly, and his adopted son Rob. His other daughter, Aimee, refused to take part in the show. The show became famous because of the amount of swearing (=bad language) used mainly by Ozzy.
